more.requirement: • Graduation at Hospitality or experience in the hotel/ resort at the similar position • Excellent communication skill in both of Vietnamese and English. • Must have a positive attitude and work well with other team members • Must be able to work under pressure • With excellent customer service skills, experience and training stand a better chance of employment • Must have the ability to lift heavy objects such as kegs and boxes containing BEERs • Have strong problem-solving skills
more.description: ● Set up the bar at the beginning of a shift and break it down at the end of a shift. ● Ensure that the “Bar Opening Procedure Checklist” is completed and follow the correct opening and closing procedures. ● Follow the correct bar operating procedures with regards to: o Stock rotation (FIFO) o Requisitions (according to business needs) o Maintaining par stocks ● Ensure that outlet is ready for service and guest comfort (music is on, lighting is on, glassware is polished, the restaurant is clean ● Dress properly in accordance with the uniform standards and maintain a hygienic grooming on duty. ● Make sure that all drinks are in accordance with list specifications and properly presented before being served. ● Collect cash for beverages or drinks served and record sales and ensure that cash is secure at all times. ● Maintain record and control of bar stock and arrange supplies. ● Greet all guests to the Tap Room warmly and courteously. ● Clean all glasses and other items needed before putting them into use. To take special care regarding the breakage and loss of such items. ● Maintain a friendly disposition behind the bar at all times. ● Aim constantly to increase beverage revenue by offering refills on beer before the guest has finished - use the name of the beer and the name of the guest if possible. ● Maintain cleanliness in all areas of the bar including counters, sinks, utensils, shelves and storage areas.
more.benefit: _ Working in a professional, dynamic environment _ 12 days annual leave per year _ Company party, company trip _ 13th salary allowances
